trans-unit.source: Provides an inline-level flow content element that causes content to render with an italic font style.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Italic> enforces a strong content model for child content.
See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Italic> content model.

This is the equivalent of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span> with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.FontStyle%2A> value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStyles.Italic%2A> and the two elements can be used interchangeably.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Italic"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Italic"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object as its initial content.
The initial content of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Italic"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Italic"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> object as its initial content, and a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that specifies an insertion position for the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> element.
This parameter can be `null`, in which case no <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> is inserted.
The insertion position at which to insert the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Italic"></xref> element after it is created.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Italic"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> objects that indicate the beginning and end of a content selection that the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Italic"></xref> will contain.
The beginning of a selection of content that the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Italic"></xref> will contain.
The end of a selection of content that the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Italic"></xref> will contain.
start and end do not resolve to a range of content suitable for enclosure by an element; for example, if start and end indicate positions in different paragraphs.
